00024 /*! \file FusionCHPTilingData.h This file provides tiling CHP file reading capabilities.*/
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CHPTilingData.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCHPData.h"

00029 
00030 namespace affymetrix_fusion_io
00031 {
00032 
00033 /*! This class provides storage and reading capabilities for tiling CHP files */
00034 class FusionCHPTilingData : public FusionCHPData
00035 {
00036 private:
00037 
00038         /*! Constructor */
00039         FusionCHPTilingData();
00040 
00041         /*! The CHP object. */
00042         affymetrix_calvin_io::CHPTilingData chpData;
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046         /*! Destructor */
00047         ~FusionCHPTilingData();
00048 
00049         /*! Get the id of the file (only valid for Command Console "calvin" files)
00050          * @return The unique file id.
00051          */
00052         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType FileId();
00053 
00054         /*! Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files. */
00055         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData *GetGenericData();
00056 
00057         /*! Gets the class name. */
00058         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType GetObjectName();
00059 
00060         /*! Gets the number of sequence stored in the file.
00061          * @return The number of sequence stored in the file.
00062          */
00063         int GetNumberSequences() { return chpData.GetNumberSequences(); }
00064 
00065         /*! Gets the name of the algorithm.
00066          * @return The algorithm name.
00067          */
00068         std::wstring GetAlgName() { return chpData.GetAlgName(); }
00069 
00070         /*! Gets the algorithm version.
00071          * @return The version.
00072          */
00073         std::wstring GetAlgVersion() { return chpData.GetAlgVersion(); }
00074 
00075         /*! Gets the algorithm parameters
00076          * @return The algoirhtm parameters.
00077          */
00078         ParameterNameValueTypeList GetAlgParams() { return chpData.GetAlgParams(); }
00079 
00080         /*! Gets the sequence data.
00081          * @return The data associated with the sequence.
00082          */
00083         TilingSequenceData GetTilingSequenceData() { return chpData.GetTilingSequenceData(); }
00084 
00085         /*! Gets the number of entries in a tiling sequence.
00086          * @param index The sequence index.
00087          * @return The number of entries in the sequence.
00088          */
00089         int32_t GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(int index) { return chpData.GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(index); }
00090 
00091         /*! Opens a group for reading.
00092          * @param index The index to the sequence.
00093          */
00094         void OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(int index) { chpData.OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(index); }
00095 
00096         /*! Returns the entry for the given row. The data set must be open.
00097          * @param row The row index.
00098          * @param e The entry.
00099          */
00100         void GetTilingSequenceEntry(int row, affymetrix_calvin_io::CHPTilingEntry& e) { chpData.GetTilingSequenceEntry(row, e); }
00101 
00102 
00103 private:
00104 
00105         /*! Reads the CHP file.
00106          * @return True if successful.
00107          */
00108         bool Read();
00109 
00110         /*! Reads the header of the CHP file
00111          * @return True if successful
00112          */
00113         bool ReadHeader();
00114 
00115         /*! A class to register the tiling CHP reader. */
00116         class Reg : public FusionCHPDataReg
00117         {
00118         public:
00119                 /*! Constructor - register the tiling file type. */
00120                 Reg() : FusionCHPDataReg()
00121                 {
00122                         std::list<std::string> ids;
00123                         ids.push_back(CHP_TILING_TYPE);
00124                         SetFileTypeIds(ids);
00125                 }
00126 
00127                 /*! Creates a tiling CHP object.
00128                  * @return The tiling CHP object.
00129                  */
00130                 FusionCHPData *MakeObject() { return new FusionCHPTilingData; }
00131         };
00132 
00133         /*! The one and only registration object. This registers the class as a CHP reader. */
00134         static Reg reg;
00135 
00136 public:
00137         /*! Converts the type to the tiling CHP type.
00138          * @param chip The pointer to the CHP data object.
00139          * @return The tiling CHP data type or NULL if not compatible.
00140          */
00141         static FusionCHPTilingData * FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip);
00142 };
